DOC.brief_summary: A 12-week multicomponent exercise is effective in improving executive function and gait performance in dual-task conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Improves Executive Function and Dual-task Decrements
DOC.criteria: age more than 65 years old ability to walk outdoor independently without assistive devices unstable medical conditions interfering with participation in the study diagnosis of dementia, psychosis, neurological disease, and depression unable to receive external information for finishing the neuropsychological tests
